Wellington College Astro Pi Docs¶

The code for this project is split into separate files that manage a certain aspect of the program. These components are connected together via references in a main Controller class, which manages the top level structure and operation of the program.

On submition, the code should be compiled to one file; the code itself should not have to be modified.

See the code for the project here

Main Classes:

  • Metric Base Class
  • Light Matrix
  • Output
  • Dummy Modules

Components:

  • Accelerometer
  • Camera
  • Gyroscope

Other:

  • Light Matrix Frames
    • Face Frames
    • Rocket Frames
    • Teetotum Frames

Main Controller¶

class main.Controller¶

Controller for top-level management of the experiment

It separates out the smaller modules and gives them access to other modules Only big-picture experiment administration should be put here

begin_experiment(framerate: int = 20, measure_period: int = 5, duration: int = 178)¶

Handles the main loop of the experiment. Calls all components and directs their results to the output controller

Parameters

  • framerate (int, optional) – The number of times to iterate the main loop per second, defaults to 20

  • measure_period (int, optional) – The number of seconds to wait between measuring components, defaults to 5

  • duration (int, optional) – The number of minutes that the experiment should run for, defaults to 178
